quizDescription: Test your knowledge of beloved Disney characters from movies and cartoons.

questions.question: Who is the princess with long golden hair and a chameleon friend in the movie 'Tangled'?
questions.explanation: Rapunzel is the princess with long golden hair and a chameleon friend named Pascal in the movie 'Tangled'.

questions.question: Who is the adventurous young boy who can fly and never grows up in 'Peter Pan'?
questions.explanation: Peter Pan is the adventurous young boy who can fly and never grows up in the movie 'Peter Pan'.

questions.question: What is the name of the lion cub who becomes the king of the Pride Lands in 'The Lion King'?
questions.explanation: Simba is the lion cub who becomes the king of the Pride Lands in the movie 'The Lion King'.

questions.question: Who is the little wooden puppet who dreams of becoming a real boy in 'Pinocchio'?
questions.explanation: Pinocchio is the little wooden puppet who dreams of becoming a real boy in the movie 'Pinocchio'.

questions.question: Which Disney princess is known for her kindness to animals and her glass slippers?
questions.explanation: Cinderella is the Disney princess known for her kindness to animals and her glass slippers.

questions.question: Who is the adventurous sea princess who dreams of exploring the human world in 'The Little Mermaid'?
questions.explanation: Ariel is the adventurous sea princess who dreams of exploring the human world in the movie 'The Little Mermaid'.

questions.question: What is the name of the lovable snowman who loves warm hugs in 'Frozen'?
questions.explanation: Olaf is the lovable snowman who loves warm hugs in the movie 'Frozen'.

questions.question: Who is the brave and adventurous girl who sets out to find her sister and save her kingdom in 'Frozen'?
questions.explanation: Anna is the brave and adventurous girl who sets out to find her sister and save her kingdom in the movie 'Frozen'.

questions.question: What is the name of the young elephant with big ears who can fly in 'Dumbo'?
questions.explanation: Dumbo is the young elephant with big ears who can fly in the movie 'Dumbo'.

questions.question: Who is the playful and mischievous experiment created by Dr. Jumba Jookiba in 'Lilo & Stitch'?
questions.explanation: Stitch is the playful and mischievous experiment created by Dr. Jumba Jookiba in the movie 'Lilo & Stitch'.
